actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Grand Elder, you have to help me! I need to find Eloise. Please. You must have some spell that can show me. Please, tell me where she is!

actions.name: GRAND ELDER
actions.value: You mean you don't know yet, child? That monster is wreaking havoc in the entire village! It has brought the curse upon us!

actions.name: GRAND ELDER
actions.value: The gods have revealed to me through a spell that the cursed one will destroy our village if it isn't stopped. This is what you're here for, [Name]. You must protect us from its curse!

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Stop! Eloise isn't cursed! And she's not a monster!

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: She was being surrounded by the people of the village. But she wasn't attacking. She was letting them hurt her. Almost as if... she wanted them to.

actions.name: GRAND ELDER
actions.value: [Name], have you gone mad? That thing is–

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: Still my friend! Look at her, she's not hurting anyone at all! She's cowering in fear!

actions.name: GRAND ELDER
actions.value: It doesn't matter! This unsightly beast – it's a threat to the village!

actions.name: YOU
actions.value: But why? She doesn't deserve this! Just because her magic is weak, doesn't mean she should be treated any less than human!
